comments.body: `rootSigmaInv * delta = rootSigmaInv * (x - breezeMu) = - (rootSigmaInv * breezeMu - rootSigmaInv * x)`

Is logpdf covered in MultivariateGaussianSuite? I didn't see it. Might be good to make some assertions about it and make sure it doesn't change much at all after this. I don't know enough to evaluate whether this loses any numeric precision (or is it from Breeze?)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +79,83 @@    val v = rootSigmaInvMulMu.copy
    BLAS.gemv(-1.0, rootSigmaInvMat, x, 1.0, v)
    u - 0.5 * BLAS.dot(v, v)
  }

comments.body: This is how breeze does it? there's no way to compute this except in log space? just wondering if we lose any accuracy this way otherwise.
